availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert L. Wilson (Crittenden County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Francis and Elizabeth Wilson. Resident of Crittenden County in 1850. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District No. 2, p. 275A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District No. 1, p. 480.
Find A Grave, "Robert Lysander Wilson (1836-1934)," Memorial #59887270, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59887270 (accessed May 14, 2018).
